tool.name: Degap.seqs
tool.command:
echo 'degap.seqs( fasta=$fasta )' | sed 's/ //g' ## mothur trips over whitespace | mothur &&
## move output files to correct destination prefix="$fasta" && mv mothur.*.logfile "$logfile" && mv \${prefix%.dat}*.ng.fasta "$out_fasta"
tool.help:
@MOTHUR_OVERVIEW@
**Command Documenation**
The degap.seqs_ command reads a fasta file and outputs a fasta containing the sequences after all gap characters are removed.
.. _degap.seqs: http://www.mothur.org/wiki/Degap.seqs
v1.21.0: Updated to Mothur 1.33
